fields_of_interest: Competition, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
person_with_legal_responsibility: Michael Strebl; Karl Gruber;  Peter Gönitzer
eu_initiatives: Most dossiers related to the EU Energy Union, Clean Energy Package, Circular Economy
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Oesterreichs Energie, Fachverband der Gas- und Wärmeversorgungsunternehmungen
goals__remit: We create the basis for the quality of life and success of our customers every day with intelligent energy and infrastructure-related services, reliability and security of supply. We build on our traditional objective to supply electricity, gas and district heating in an environmentally friendly way. We concentrate our efforts on the Vienna model, both nationally and internationally, and promote both the use of renewable energy and energy efficiency.
